NIMHANS Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 06 Senior Resident Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 16, 2025, 12:24 IST
 National Institute of Mental Health and Neuroscience
 6 Jobs |  Posted On : 16-Aug-2025 |  Karnataka |  Salary : 67,700 to 208,700




FOLLOW

National Institute of Mental Health and Neurosciences (NIMHANS) has declared the latest job notification for 2025. Allotted 06 vacancies for Senior Resident posts. Those candidates who have qualified in the MD, DNB can grab this chance and apply for the NIMHANS Recruitment 2025. Here we included the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, and application fee, and hw to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can attend the interview at the given venue. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government obs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Karnataka.

NIMHANS Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Senior Resident 	06	MD, DNB

Age Limit for the NIMHANS Recruitment 2025 

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 27 years.

Selection Process for the NIMHANS Recruitment 2025 

Interview

Salary Structure for the NIMHANS Recruitment 2025 

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 67,700 /-per month
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 2,08,700 /- per month.

Application fee for the NIMHANS Recruitment 2025 

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the NIMHANS Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the  Senior Resident Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form carefully.
Then, attend the interview at the address given below.

Venue

Seminar Hall, 1st Floor, Director’s Office, NIMHANS, Bengaluru – 560029

Important Dates

Date of Walk-in-Interview	25-08-2025
Application form	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
